00047 void TrackerDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00048 {
00049         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00050         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_SOURCENAME, m_sourcename);
00051         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_SOURCENAMET, m_sourcenameT);
00052         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_RADIOFILE, m_mode);
00053         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_FRAMESTART, m_frameStart);
00054         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_FRAMESTOP, m_frameStop);
00055         CTime time1 = m_startTime, date1 = m_startTime;
00056         DDX_DateTimeCtrl(pDX, IDC_STARTTIME, time1);
00057         DDX_MonthCalCtrl(pDX, IDC_STARTDATE, date1);
00058         if (pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate) {
00059                 m_startTime = CTime(
00060                         date1.GetYear(),
00061                         date1.GetMonth(),
00062                         date1.GetDay(),
00063                         time1.GetHour(),
00064                         time1.GetMinute(),
00065                         time1.GetSecond());
00066         }
00067 }
00068 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void TrackerDialog::OnBnClickedSourceSelectButton()
00070 {
00071         UpdateData();
00072         if (m_mode == RGBFILE || m_mode == TRGBFILE || m_mode == PGRFILE) {
00073                 CFileDialog dlg(TRUE, NULL, NULL, OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, "AVI files (*.avi)|*.avi|MPEG files (*.mpg; *.mpeg)|*.mpeg; *.mpg|PGR files (*.pgr)|*.pgr|All Files (*.*)|*.*||", this);
00074                 char title[]= {"Open Video File"};
00075                 dlg.m_ofn.lpstrTitle = title;
00076                 if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
00077                         m_sourcename = dlg.GetPathName();
00078                 }
00079         }
00080         else {
00081                 //int* out;
00082                 //int nselected = cvcamSelectCamera(&out);
00083                 SelectCameraDialog camDlg;
00084                 if (camDlg.DoModal()) {
00085                         m_sourcename = camDlg.m_names[camDlg.m_choice];
00086                 }
00087         }
00088         if (!Initialize())
00089                 m_sourcename = "";
00090         UpdateData(false);
00091         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00092 }
00093 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void TrackerDialog::OnBnClickedSourceSelectButtonT()
00095 {
00096         UpdateData();
00097         if (m_mode == TRGBFILE) {
00098                 CFileDialog dlg(TRUE, NULL, NULL, OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, "AVI files (*.avi)|*.avi|MPEG files (*.mpg; *.mpeg)|*.mpeg; *.mpg|PGR files (*.pgr)|*.pgr|All Files (*.*)|*.*||", this);
00099                 char title[]= {"Open Thermal Video File"};
00100                 dlg.m_ofn.lpstrTitle = title;
00101                 if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
00102                         m_sourcenameT = dlg.GetPathName();
00103                 }
00104         }
00105         UpdateData(false);
00106 }

00108 void TrackerDialog::Serialize( CArchive& ar )
00109  {
00110         CObject::Serialize( ar );
00111         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00112                 ar << m_sourcename << m_mode << m_frameStart << m_frameStop << m_startTime;     
00113                 if (m_mode == TRGBFILE)
00114                         ar << m_sourcenameT;
00115         }
00116         else {
00117                 ar >> m_sourcename >> m_mode >> m_frameStart >> m_frameStop >> m_startTime;
00118                 if (m_mode == TRGBFILE)
00119                         ar >> m_sourcenameT;
00120         }
00121  }
